title: Coming soon: WCH Crime
description:
Teaser trailer for our forthcoming occasional podcast series WCH Crime, where true crime meets the struggle for a better world, as well as an update about forthcoming podcast episodes.
You can support this podcast, and get exclusive early access to episodes and other benefits at https://patreon.com/workingclasshistory

We are sorry for the delay in putting up new podcast episode, but we are working on a number of episodes right now, some of which we have been working on for a year, trying to get them as good as we can before putting them online. But a number are nearly ready, and once they start going up we will be able to become more regular again.
